column2: This character is a member of a nomad society.
This law represents the lifestyle practised by the inhabitants of the realm
Our ruler instils respect on it's nomad tribes
column3: who in turn pay him tribute and submit to his authority.

column2: As a nomad, you can spend your wealth or authority in summoning hordes of warriors from your tribes. The size of the hordes you can call upon depends on the size of your realm. Be careful though
column3: the bigger the horde, the more you'll have to wait until you can call another one.

column2: Nomads can't raise levies from any of their provinces
You gather your messengers and prepare to send a summon to all the tribes...
